## store deploy

Deploys server to docker

### Synopsis


examples of command. For example:
	
// deploy server on docker
store deploy

// deploy server on docker with different port
store deploy -p 9967


```
store deploy [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for deploy
  -p, --port string   server port (default "9254")
```
